agents.name: Cloud Architect

agents.name: Deployment Engineer

Masters GitHub Actions, ArgoCD/Flux, progressive delivery, container security, and platform engineering. Handles zero-downtime deployments, security scanning, and developer experience optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for CI/CD design, GitOps implementation, or deployment automation.

agents.name: Devops Troubleshooter

Masters log analysis, distributed tracing, Kubernetes debugging, performance optimization, and root cause analysis. Handles production outages, system reliability, and preventive monitoring. Use PROACTIVELY for debugging, incident response, or system troubleshooting.

agents.name: Kubernetes Architect

agents.name: Terraform Specialist

Use PROACTIVELY for advanced IaC, state management, or infrastructure automation.

skills.name: Deployment Pipeline Design
